column4: After reading and satisfactorily understanding what is required of you for this study, please select one below to indicate your acceptance to proceed with the study
column7: What is your current level of deployment?

column19: Work environment and safety: My physical working environment is conducive to delivering quality healthcare services.
column20: Work environment and safety: Essential equipment and supplies are reliably available when needed to perform my duties.
column21: Work environment and safety: There is regular and supportive supervision from management to ensure you have the necessary tools and supplies to deliver.
column22: Work environment and safety: There is regular and supportive supervision from senior colleagues to ensure you have the necessary knowledge and skills to deliver.
column23: Work environment and safety: Institution complies with workplace safety procedures and standards.
column24: Work environment and safety: Staff are provided with safety equipment and training.
column25: Work environment and safety: Clear procedures are in place for reporting accidents and hazards.
column26: Work environment and safety: I feel secure while performing my duties.
column27: Well-Being: I have felt cheerful and in good spirits.
column28: Well-Being: I have felt calm and relaxed.
column29: Well-Being: I have felt active and vigorous.
column30: Well-Being: I woke up feeling fresh and rested
column31: Well-Being: My daily life has been filled with things that interest me.
column32: Emotional situation while at work: My work puts me in emotionally disturbing situations.
column33: Emotional situation while at work: My work is emotionally demanding.
column34: Emotional situation while at work: I get help and support from colleagues when I feel emotionally down while at work.
column35: Emotional situation while at work: My immediate supervisor is willing to listen to my work-related concerns
column36: Emotional situation while at work: There are sufficient mechanisms put in place to support our emotional well-being while at work.
column37: Feeling in last four weeks: I have felt calm and peaceful while at work.
column38: Feeling in last four weeks: I have felt nervous about work situations.
column39: Feeling in last four weeks: I have found it challenging to be happy at work.
column40: Feeling in last four weeks: I have found it difficult to think clearly while at work
column41: Feeling in last four weeks: I believe I can cope with most of the situations at work.
column42: Burnout: I feel emotionally drained by my work.
column43: Burnout: Working with people all day long requires a great deal of effort.
column44: How often do you feel emotionally exhausted?
column45: I feel like my work is breaking me down.
column46: I feel frustrated by my work.
column47: I feel I work too hard at my job.
column48: It stresses me too much to work in direct contact with people
column49: I feel like am at the end of my rope.
column50: Depersonalization: I feel I look after certain patients/clients impersonally, as if they are objects
column51: I feel tired when I get up in the morning and have to face another day at work.
column52: I have the impression that my patients/clients make me responsible for some of their problems
column53: I am at the end of my patience at the end of my workday.
column54: I really don't care about what happens to some of my patients/clients.
column55: I have become more insensitive to people since I've been working.
column56: I'm afraid that this job is making me uncaring.
column57: Personal Achievement: I accomplish many worthwhile things in this job.
column59: I am easily able to understand what my patients/clients feel.
column60: I look after my patients/clients problems very effectively.
column61: In my work, I handle emotional problems very calmly.
column62: Through my work, I feel that I have a positive influence on people
column63: I am easily able to create a relaxed atmosphere with my patients/clients.
column64: I feel refreshed when I have been close to my patients/clients at work
column65: Salary and incentives: My salary is commensurate with the work I do.
column66: The payment system in my workplace is reliable.
column67: Allowances are fairly applied at my workplace.
column68: My facility supports teamwork among staff.
column69: I feel supported by my employer to pursue personal development.
column70: I receive recognition for the work done.
column71: The incentives available make me feel motivated to continue working at my current workplace.
column72: Career development: There is optimal utilization and development of staff skills.
column73: Staff training addresses current and future needs.
column74: Career ladders and succession plans exist and are used.
column76: I have access to career guidance on professional growth.
column77: Promotion opportunities in my workplace are based on merit and transparent manner.
column78: Performance management: Staff shift programs and rosters are well managed.
column79: Alternative staffing methods are applied eg locums, subcontracting, outsourcing and temporally hires.
column80: Effective workflow and supply chain management systems are in place.
column81: Clear job descriptions standards and performance expectations exist and utilized.
column83: Periodic performance evaluations are carried out
column84: Reward and recognition systems are in place.
column85: Professional satisfaction: How satisfied are you with your current role
column86: Working relationship with other facility staff.
column87: Working relationship with County Health staff.
column88: Your ability to provide high-quality of care given the current working conditions in the facility.

column90: What is your level of satisfaction with the quality of leadership in your workplace?
column93: Employment terms and conditions: My salary, allowances and benefits are clearly defined.
column94: Employment terms and conditions: My salary, allowances and benefits are well aligned with my role and responsibilities.
column95: Employment terms and conditions: My salary, allowances and benefits are similar to my colleagues with similar qualifications doing similar jobs.
column96: Employment terms and conditions: I feel secure in my current employment.
